title: One Piece: Straw Hat Theater
synopsis: Straw Hat Theater is made up of five shorts that aired alongside One Piece episodes 279 through 283 in October 2006. They are based on Oda Eiichiro's side comics that were drawn when he was given three sheets of blank paper by his editor and told to draw anything.
characters: ['Monkey D., Luffy', 'Roronoa, Zoro', 'Sanji', 'Nico, Robin', 'Tony Tony, Chopper', 'Usopp', 'Nami', 'Tsubaki', 'Tashigi']
voices: ['Tanaka, Mayumi', 'Nakai, Kazuya', 'Hirata, Hiroaki', 'Yamaguchi, Yuriko', 'Yamaguchi, Kappei', 'Okamura, Akemi', 'Sonobe, Keiichi', 'Noda, Junko']
